뉴스 및 의사록

뉴스 및 자료

2018 BOK-BIS Joint Conference Asia-Pacific fixed income markets: evolving structure, participation and pricing

Venue: Diamond Hall, 22F, The Plaza Hotel Seoul, Seoul

Sunday, November 18, 2018

  • 19:00-20:30
    Welcome Reception [Ruby Hall, 22F, The Plaza Hotel, Seoul]

Monday, November 19, 2018

  • 8:30-9:00
    Coffee and Pastries
  • 9:00-9:10
    Opening Remarks Juyeol Lee (Governor, The Bank of Korea)
  • 9:10-9:30
    Photo Session
  • 9:30-10:50
    Paper 1: On the global impact of risk-off shocks and policy-put frameworks
  • Chair
    Hiroto Uehara (Head of International Coordination Division, Bank of Japan)
    Authors
    Ricardo Caballero (Professor, Massachusetts Institute of Technology) Gunes Kamber (Senior Economist, BIS)
    Discussant
    Piti Disyatat (Director of Economic Research, Bank of Thailand)
  • 10:50-11:10
    Coffee Break
  • 11:10-12:30
    Paper 2: Determinants of sovereign local currency bond yields: The case of Asia-Pacific
  • Chair
    Mary Jane Chiong (Managing Director, Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas)
    Authors
    Mikhail Chernov (Professor, UCLA Anderson School of Management) Drew Creal (Associate Professor, The University of Norte Dame) Peter Hordahl (Principal Economist, BIS)
    Discussant
    Min Wei (Deputy Associate Director, Federal Reserve Board)
  • 12:30-13:50
    Lunch [Maple Hall, 4F, The Plaza Hotel, Seoul]
  • 13:50-15:10
    Paper 3: Corporate bond market liquidity in emerging markets : The case of Malaysia
  • Chair
    Mahabala Rajeshwar Rao (Executive Director, Reserve Bank of India)
    Authors
    Allaudeen Hameed (Professor, National University of Singapore) Frank Packer (Regional Adviser, BIS)
    Discussant
    Dragon Tang (Professor, Hong Kong University)
  • 15:10-16:30
    Paper 4: The rise of benchmark bonds: de jure and de facto benchmarks in emerging Asia
  • Chair
    Seung Beom Koh (Member of Monetary Policy Board, The Bank of Korea)
    Authors
    Eli Remolona (Visiting Professor, Williams College) James Yetman (Principal Economist, BIS)
    Discussant
    Terence Chong (Associate Professor, Chinese University of Hong Kong)
  • 16:30-17:00
    Coffee Break
  • 17:00-18:00
    Keynote Address : The term structures of global yields
  • Chair
    Benoit Mojon (Head of Economic Analysis, BIS)
    Speaker
    Emanuel Mönch (Head of Research, Deutsche Bundesbank)
  • 18:30-20:30
    Conference Dinner [FARO Grand, 36F, Mirae Asset Center 1, Seoul]

Tuesday, November 20, 2018

  • 8:00-8:30
    Coffee and Pastries
  • 8:30-9:50
    Paper 5: Local currency bond returns, foreign investors and portfolio flows in emerging markets
  • Chair
    Wook Sohn (Director General, The Bank of Korea)
    Authors
    Giorgio Valente (Senior Economist, Hong Kong Institute for Monetary Research) Inhwan So (Economist, Bank of Korea) Jason Wu (Head of Economic Research, Hong Kong Monetary Authority)
    Discussant
    Jie (Jay) Cao (Associate Professor, Chinese University of Hong Kong)
  • 9:50-11:10
    Paper 6: Corporate bond use in Asia and the U.S.
  • Chair
    Wook Sohn (Director General, The Bank of Korea)
    Authors
    Gregory Duffee (Professor, Johns Hopkins University) Peter Hordahl (Principal Economist, BIS)
    Discussant
    Vidhan Goyal (Professor, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology)
  • 11:10-11:30
    Coffee Break
  • 11:30-12:50
    Paper 7: The role of different institutional investors in Asia-Pacific bond markets during the Taper Tantrum
  • Chair
    Siddharth Tiwari (Chief Representative, BIS)
    Authors
    David Ng (Professor, Cornell University) Ilhyock Shim (Principal Economist, BIS) Jose Maria Vidal Pastor (BIS)
    Discussant
    Johan Sulaeman (Associate Professor, National University of Singapore)
  • 12:50-14:00
    Lunch [Maple Hall, 4F, The Plaza Hotel, Seoul]
  • 14:00-15:20
    Policy Panel: Challenges in fostering Asian local currency bond markets
  • Chair
    Hyun Song Shin (Economic Adviser and Head of Research, BIS)
    Panelists
    Yoga Affandi (Director, Bank Indonesia) Joon-Ho Hahm (Professor, Yonsei University) Cho-hoi Hui (Division Head, Hong Kong Monetary Authority) Amporn Sangmanee (Senior Director, Bank of Thailand)
  • 15:20-15:30
    Closing Remarks Hyun Song Shin (Economic Adviser and Head of Research, BIS)

내가 본 콘텐츠

보도자료 2023년 4/4분기 및 연간 실질 국내총생산(속보) 공지사항 경제통계국 국민소득총괄팀 통계조사보조원 채용 안내 블로그 2023년 한국계 외화채권 시장의 특징 및 2024년 전망 연구자료 기후변화 물리적리스크가 글로벌가치사슬을 통해 국내 거시경제에 미치는 영향 공지사항 경제통계국 국민소득총괄팀 통계조사보조원 채용 안내 블로그 2023년 한국계 외화채권 시장의 특징 및 2024년 전망
1 / 2
